alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 11 at 12:58PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Gadsden, Jefferson and Leon. * WHEN...Until 300 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1258 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida A and M, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Havana, Midway, Doak Campbell Stadium, Baum, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Capitola, Chaires, Chaires Crossroads, Lloyd, Apalachee Regional Park, Ralford Greenway, Pisgah Church, Miccosukee Road Greenway and Tom Brown Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
